ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Err, the sentence in your secondary slow ratio is what you want to follow should have been: in your secondary  slot ratio is what you want to follow LOL..
ygData.messageBody:
Err, the sentence "in your secondary slow ratio is what you want to follow"
should have been:
"in your secondary slot ratio is what you want to follow"

LOL..
----- Original Message -----
From: "Mike Finger" <mike_finger@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 30, 2001 11:18 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons


> I have always heard (my bro is a ranger and follows the ranger board
> closely) that you want your fastest weapon in your primary to be able to
get
> your damage bonus as often as possible and that in your secondary slow
ratio
> is what you want to follow (as your secondary does not get damage bonus).
>
> I'm using a 6/19 in primary (Sainy's claw) and a 13/26 (Flameweaver) in
> secondary.
>
> My 2 cp, as well.
>
> Notebender
> Bard of the 32nd song
> Veeshan
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Christopher Sanders" <christopher.sanders@...>
> To: "Eqbards (E-mail)" <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, November 30, 2001 10:20 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] Weapons
>
>
> > Life in here again. :) Hi all.
> >
> > How do you determine what weapon to put in what hand, for best results?
I
> > haven't seen this come up in a looong time, and until recently, it has
> been
> > a no brainer for me. :)
> >
> > But, for a while, I had an 8/24 and a 6/19, and I assumed the 8/24 was
> best
> > in the primary hand, but someone said it might be better to have the
6/19
> in
> > primary.
> >
> > Well, now I have an 11/23 and a 12/26. Initially, I'd put the 11/23 in
> > primary, since it's faster, but..well, I just don't know.
> >
> > Atonal the slow
> > Would you believe 45! :)

http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
